channel.title: Requestion help with emotes. [pi]
channel.description:
hey guys, i am using pi base and i am trying to fix my emotes, currently you can spam click skillcape emotes and any other emote and it will start it while your in another emote.
i have looked on runescape and it sends a return message saying, you are already in an emote. i have tryed searching that in google and havnt come across anything. if someone could help that would be a huge help.
